TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_liel_nu_tawawaan_masumad_ku_labuay_a_banges_nu_pucu’, title = liel_nu_tawawaan_masumad_ku_labuay_a_banges_nu_pucu’, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/liel_nu_tawawaan_masumad_ku_labuay_a_banges_nu_pucu’} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == liel nu tawawaan masumad ku labuay a banges nu pucu'. 宮頸上皮內瘤樣病變 liel nu tawawaan masumad ku labuay a banges nu pucu' "kamu nu Ing, "Cervical intraepithelial neoplasia, CIN" singangan aca tu u cayay ka tabaki liel nu tawawaan "kamu nu Ing, cervical dysplasia" anucaay pucu' a liel nu tawawaana "cervical interstitial neoplasia", liel nu tawawaana u caya katabaki atu liel nu tawawaana masakinasay a si-paw pulung nu ngangan tu tizaay a gang, u silamitay tu a gang ayaw nu gang a masumad. liel nu tawawaan masumad ku labuay a banges nu pucu' caay ku gang, taneng a mingaay. . nilaculan hatu liel nu tawawaan masumad ku labuay a banges nu pucu', nika caay kakatuud ku mala gangay a liel nu tawawaan. sakahin u CIN angangan makayniay bayduk nu tacucuay nu tademaw tu "HPV" i liel nu tawawaan haymaw satu malalid, micide talakaw ku kalalid 16 anucaay 18 HPV. .引起CIN (HPV) 16或18型HPV. i bwahngu saayaway maazih a imelang u liel nu tawawaan pabaw nu banges a sipaw anucaay hekal malawcu', saaca i labu a uzip nu tatayna caay kaazih. i HPV akalalid zikuz tanengn maazih ku kasumad nu si-paw, mahiniay kutkutan ku si-paw "pangangan han tu "makulemian ku si-paw" mahiniay maazih tu ku kasumad a liel nu tawawaan labuay a banges nu pucu'. liel nu tawawaan masumad ku labuay a banges nu pucu' nikaawas tu pikinsa a maazih, mahiniay maawas pa-s a nisasing mikinsa tu liel nu tawawaan, ayaw a mikinsa hakay u gang. makinsa anu caay kakapay, amibwahngu patabaki tu tawawaan, anucaay makay uzip mikelit a mikinsa. .在HPV . lalekalan nu imelang 病因 liel nu tawawaan labuay nu banges a pucu' nikasumad nu imelang sakas haw masasibut, uyni a imelang mahapinang nu makayniay u alip hanay, malali "katalawan" mahiniay u bayduk nu tacucuay nu tademaw, "mahiniay saka 16,18,31,45 kasahini" nu tatayna, hinalaliday a tatayna ayaw nu 17 ku mihcaan nu tatayna siwawa. namahini uzuma sakatalawan amasumad ku liel nu tawawaan labuay nu banges a pucu', pasu mikudus tu uzip, katuud ku cabay, caay picukaymas tu paw-syen-taw, siuning tu pang, katuud ku nilecuh, mapela' ku liel nu tawawaan atu mitabaku. sakay CINI nu imelangay, caay paising kapahtu sa pacena' amingaay. uyzasa u imelanga kapipaising tu, pademiaden amikinsa tu liel nu tawawaan mapelu' ku su-paw-sye atu mibwahngu mikinsa tu labu nu puki. anu i 12 a buladan, caliway tu kinapina ku pikingsa masumad ku imelang kalalid tu mikinsa, a malingatu mingaay. 對於CIN1 . sakay katuud ku tanengay a macunus ku cayay kaazih, sisa pihacengay nu cayay kaazih ku kacunus atu sigangay, kalamkamen mingaay, zuma pasu cudetay ku sapituduh, hanu dingkien mituduh, liel nu tawawaan u masaimuluay a akiti' nu dingki ku sapicici' anucaay u cuya ku sapicici' tu liel nu tawawaan.sapingaay a imi u HPV yubciwsia mitanam henay. liel nu tawawaan masumad ku labuay a banges nu pucu' cici'en mingaay hakay caay kasibili anucaay caay ka siwawa macunus ku katalawan. hina asa liel nu tawawaan masumad ku labuay a banges nu pucu' kilul tu mangaleb malagang mahiniay makay alip ku kasahini. nika katuud ku patinakuan tu liel nu tawawaan masumad ku labuay a banges nu pucu' caay paisingen kapah satu. CINI nu imelangay pakala tu 70% pesen cacay a mihcaan kapahsatu, 90% pesen i tusa a mihcaan kapahsau. pakala tu50 % pesen ku CIN2 nu imelangay i tusa a mihcaan kapahtu. pihacengay malagang mahiniay palalecad 15 a mihcaan "3 katukuh 40 a mihcaan" ku demiad. tahkal ku nisulitan, gang a imelang hakay saayaway mikinsa anucaay u caay ka imelangay u cayay henay kaazih, a pabesut u pihacengay a gangn. I kalalid tu HPV a imelang hawsa, zuma katalawan u HPV mikuwan tu p53, wng-mu-si-paw pucu' tan-pay tu pucu' mikuwan tu ci-ing, mahini sa malalid ku si-paw taneng milimek tu pikinsa, a yadah kunisuped, amalagang. pakala tu 25 a mang katukuh 100 a mang ku siimelangay a tatayna nu Amilika tu liel nu tawawaan masumad ku labuay a banges nu pucu', nika angangan u siimelangay a mihcaan i 25 katukuh 35 ku mihcaan. 大約25萬至100 25至35歲. malalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan

== kakiliman == liel no tawawaan masomad ko laboay a banges no poco'. 宮頸上皮內瘤樣病變 liel no tawawaan masomad ko laboay a banges no poco' "kamo no Ing, "Cervical intraepithelial neoplasia, CIN" singangan aca to o cayay ka tabaki liel no tawawaan "kamo no Ing, cervical dysplasia" anocaay poco' a liel no tawawaana "cervical interstitial neoplasia", liel no tawawaana o caya katabaki ato liel no tawawaana masakinasay a si-paw polong no ngangan to tizaay a gang, o silamitay to a gang ayaw no gang a masomad. liel no tawawaan masomad ko laboay a banges no poco' caay ko gang, taneng a mingaay. . nilacolan hato liel no tawawaan masomad ko laboay a banges no poco', nika caay kakatood ko mala gangay a liel no tawawaan. sakahin o CIN angangan makayniay baydok no tacocoay no tademaw to "HPV" i liel no tawawaan haymaw sato malalid, micide talakaw ko kalalid 16 anocaay 18 HPV. .引起CIN (HPV) 16或18型HPV. i bwahngo saayaway maazih a imelang o liel no tawawaan pabaw no banges a sipaw anocaay hekal malawco', saaca i labo a ozip no tatayna caay kaazih. i HPV akalalid zikoz tanengn maazih ko kasomad no si-paw, mahiniay kotkotan ko si-paw "pangangan han to "makolemian ko si-paw" mahiniay maazih to ko kasomad a liel no tawawaan laboay a banges no poco'. liel no tawawaan masomad ko laboay a banges no poco' nikaawas to pikinsa a maazih, mahiniay maawas pa-s a nisasing mikinsa to liel no tawawaan, ayaw a mikinsa hakay o gang. makinsa ano caay kakapay, amibwahngo patabaki to tawawaan, anocaay makay ozip mikelit a mikinsa. .在HPV . lalekalan no imelang 病因 liel no tawawaan laboay no banges a poco' nikasomad no imelang sakas haw masasibot, oyni a imelang mahapinang no makayniay o alip hanay, malali "katalawan" mahiniay o baydok no tacocoay no tademaw, "mahiniay saka 16,18,31,45 kasahini" no tatayna, hinalaliday a tatayna ayaw no 17 ko mihcaan no tatayna siwawa. namahini ozoma sakatalawan amasomad ko liel no tawawaan laboay no banges a poco', paso mikodos to ozip, katood ko cabay, caay picokaymas to paw-syen-taw, sioning to pang, katood ko nilecoh, mapela' ko liel no tawawaan ato mitabako. sakay CINI no imelangay, caay paising kapahto sa pacena' amingaay. oyzasa o imelanga kapipaising to, pademiaden amikinsa to liel no tawawaan mapelo' ko so-paw-sye ato mibwahngo mikinsa to labo no poki. ano i 12 a boladan, caliway to kinapina ko pikingsa masomad ko imelang kalalid to mikinsa, a malingato mingaay. 對於CIN1 . sakay katood ko tanengay a maconos ko cayay kaazih, sisa pihacengay no cayay kaazih ko kaconos ato sigangay, kalamkamen mingaay, zoma paso codetay ko sapitodoh, hano dingkien mitodoh, liel no tawawaan o masaimoloay a akiti' no dingki ko sapicici' anocaay o coya ko sapicici' to liel no tawawaan.sapingaay a imi o HPV yobciwsia mitanam henay. liel no tawawaan masomad ko laboay a banges no poco' cici'en mingaay hakay caay kasibili anocaay caay ka siwawa maconos ko katalawan. hina asa liel no tawawaan masomad ko laboay a banges no poco' kilol to mangaleb malagang mahiniay makay alip ko kasahini. nika katood ko patinakoan to liel no tawawaan masomad ko laboay a banges no poco' caay paisingen kapah sato. CINI no imelangay pakala to 70% pesen cacay a mihcaan kapahsato, 90% pesen i tosa a mihcaan kapahsao. pakala to50 % pesen ko CIN2 no imelangay i tosa a mihcaan kapahto. pihacengay malagang mahiniay palalecad 15 a mihcaan "3 katokoh 40 a mihcaan" ko demiad. tahkal ko nisolitan, gang a imelang hakay saayaway mikinsa anocaay o caay ka imelangay o cayay henay kaazih, a pabesot o pihacengay a gangn. I kalalid to HPV a imelang hawsa, zoma katalawan o HPV mikowan to p53, wng-mo-si-paw poco' tan-pay to poco' mikowan to ci-ing, mahini sa malalid ko si-paw taneng milimek to pikinsa, a yadah konisoped, amalagang. pakala to 25 a mang katokoh 100 a mang ko siimelangay a tatayna no Amilika to liel no tawawaan masomad ko laboay a banges no poco', nika angangan o siimelangay a mihcaan i 25 katokoh 35 ko mihcaan. 大約25萬至100 25至35歲. malalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinengan
